typePredicateParameterMismatch(6,14): error TS1003: Identifier expected.
typePredicateParameterMismatch(6,14): error TS1005: ';' expected.
typePredicateParameterMismatch(7,1): error TS1128: Declaration or statement expected.
typePredicateParameterMismatch(11,10): error TS1128: Declaration or statement expected.
typePredicateParameterMismatch(11,10): error TS1005: '{' expected.

==== typePredicateParameterMismatch (9 errors) ====
    
    // This test verifies that the checker doesn't panic when a type predicate
    // references a parameter name that doesn't match any actual function parameter.
    
    type TypeA = { kind: 'a' };
    ~~~~
!!! error TS1128: Declaration or statement expected.
                 ~
!!! error TS1005: ';' expected.
                 ~
!!! error TS1003: Identifier expected.
    type TypeB = { kind: 'b' };
    ~~~~
!!! error TS1128: Declaration or statement expected.
                 ~
!!! error TS1003: Identifier expected.
                 ~
!!! error TS1005: ';' expected.
    type UnionType = TypeA | TypeB;
    ~~~~
!!! error TS1128: Declaration or statement expected.
    
    function isTypeA(
      _value: UnionType
    ): value is TypeA {  // "value" doesn't match parameter "_value"
             ~~
!!! error TS1128: Declaration or statement expected.
             ~~
!!! error TS1005: '{' expected.
      return true;
    }
    
    function test(input: UnionType): void {
      if (isTypeA(input)) {
        console.log(input.kind);
      }
    }
